description: Frieren and Fern wonder what type of good smell the spell produces. They try it on Stark, and find that he smells like grilled meat. The two conclude that the smell is based on the user`s definition of a good smell. Stark asks what`s for dinner, and both Frieren and Fern exclaim that they want meat, scaring Stark.

titles.title: Magic Episode 4: Magic to Make a Good Scent Come from the Body
Marumaru no Mahou Dai 4 Kai: Karada kara Yoi Nioi ga Deru Mahou
●●の魔法 第4回: 体から良いにおいが出る魔法
迷你动画「〇〇的魔法」第4话：「能从身上散发香味的魔法」
